00066 Delimiter are "," and ":". to use them in values escape them with "#". Escape "#" also with "#"

00072 if(!isset($_GET['cmd'])){
00073           zlog::log(zerror::err('no command diven',null,zerror::critical));
00074           exit;
00075 }
00076 
00077 if(!is_array($_GET['cmd'])){
00078           $_GET['cmd']=array($_GET['cmd']);
00079 }
00080 
00081 $includedclasses=array();
00082 
00083 
00084 
00085 $cmdparser=new CMDParser();
00086 
00087 foreach($_GET['cmd'] as $command){
00088           list($err,$cmd)=$cmdparser->decode($command);
00089 
00090           if($err){
00091                     zlog::log($err);
00092           }else{
00093               zlog::debugLog('cmd',$cmd);
00094               try{
00095                if(!isset($includedclasses[$cmd['class']])){
00096                               require_once 'classes/'.$cmd['class'].'.php';
00097                               $includedclasses[$cmd['class']]=new $cmd['class']();
00098                     }
00099 
00100                     list($ret,$return)=call_user_func_array(array($includedclasses[$cmd['class']], $cmd['action']), $cmd['params']);
00101                     if($err)zlog::log($err);
00102                     
00103               }catch(Exception $e){
00104                     zlog::log(zerror::err('fail: cannot initalize class.',$cmd['class'],zerror::critical));
00105               }
00106 
00107           }
00108 }
